I am not sure you can just move them between the two OSEs, if you can, then you just need to use the file manager, and copy them
you need to use "CTRL-H", to show hidden folders, and then just copy from the windows path to the ubuntu path, which is .mozilla on your home dir

check their site, or try getdeb
if you messed up your mozilla profile, just rename your current profile, from the terminal: mv ~/.mozilla ~/.mozilla.old
